title: ImportError: No module named torch
body_html:
OS: Ubuntu 16.04
Installation: pip, python2.7, CUDA: None

ubuntu@smpl:~$ sudo pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.3.1-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl 
The directory '/home/ubuntu/.cache/pip/http' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and the cache has been disabled. Please check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
The directory '/home/ubuntu/.cache/pip' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and caching wheels has been disabled. check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
Collecting torch==0.3.1 from http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.3.1-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl
  Downloading http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.3.1-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl (47.2MB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 47.2MB 92.6MB/s 
Collecting numpy (from torch==0.3.1)
  Downloading numpy-1.14.1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl (12.1MB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 12.1MB 105kB/s 
Collecting pyyaml (from torch==0.3.1)
  Downloading PyYAML-3.12.tar.gz (253kB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 256kB 4.6MB/s 
Installing collected packages: numpy, pyyaml, torch
  Running setup.py install for pyyaml ... done
Successfully installed numpy-1.14.1 pyyaml-3.12 torch-0.3.1
ubuntu@smpl:~$ sudo pip install torchvision 
The directory '/home/ubuntu/.cache/pip/http' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and the cache has been disabled. Please check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
The directory '/home/ubuntu/.cache/pip' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and caching wheels has been disabled. check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
Collecting torchvision
  Downloading torchvision-0.2.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl (48kB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 51kB 4.7MB/s 
Collecting pillow>=4.1.1 (from torchvision)
  Downloading Pillow-5.0.0-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl (5.8MB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 5.9MB 211kB/s 
Requirement already satisfied: torch in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages (from torchvision)
Collecting six (from torchvision)
  Downloading six-1.11.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages (from torch->torchvision)
Installing collected packages: pillow, six, torchvision
Successfully installed pillow-5.0.0 six-1.11.0 torchvision-0.2.0
ubuntu@smpl:~$ python
Python 2.7.12 (default, Mar 11 2018, 02:49:06) 
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
ImportError: No module named torch

OS: Ubuntu 16.04
Installation: pip, python2.7, CUDA: None
```
ubuntu@smpl:~$ sudo pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.3.1-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl 
The directory '/home/ubuntu/.cache/pip/http' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and the cache has been disabled. Please check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
The directory '/home/ubuntu/.cache/pip' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and caching wheels has been disabled. check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.

    100% |████████████████████████████████| 47.2MB 92.6MB/s 
Collecting numpy (from torch==0.3.1)
```
